quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.quote: You are enough just as you are.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

quotes.author: Buddha
quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.

quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
quotes.quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.

quotes.author: Stephen Hawking
quotes.quote: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet.

quotes.author: John Lennon
quotes.quote: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

sections.paragraph: Find the support you need today.

sections.headline: Resources
sections.paragraph: Unlock your power for every level of wellness.

sections.headline: Pattern Interrupts
sections.paragraph: Rewiring your mind with something new.
